appName: Car War Vr: RC Stunt Game
displayName: Car War Vr: RC Stunt Game
display_name: Car War Vr: RC Stunt Game
display_long_description:
Car War VR: RC Stunt Game is an action-packed VR racing and combat game that puts you in control of high-powered remote control cars armed to the teeth. Designed exclusively for virtual reality, this single-player experience combines arcade-style racing, vehicle combat, and extreme stunt driving into one adrenaline-fueled package.
Strap into the cockpit view of your RC war machine and enter explosive arenas filled with jumps, ramps, and AI enemies. Use skill, speed, and strategy to perform jaw-dropping stunts, avoid deadly traps, and blast opponents with powerful weapons like rockets, lasers, and EMPs.
Customize your car with a variety of upgrades—boosters, armor, wheels, and weapons—to suit your combat style. Explore unique environments, from backyard battlegrounds to sci-fi stunt zones, each crafted for fast-paced, chaotic fun.
Key Features:
Immersive VR racing combat with intuitive controls


High-speed, physics-driven RC stunt action


- Customizable cars with unlockable weapons and gadgets
- Challenging single-player missions and smart AI opponents
- Explosive visuals with slow-motion effects and dynamic crashes

Experience the thrill of car battles in VR like never before. Car War VR: RC Stunt Game is the ultimate test of your reflexes, creativity, and combat driving skills.
